method.name: List

param.name: channel
param.description: channel, which will limit to those streams

param.name: title
param.description: title, which will limit to streams with the given title

param.name: category
param.description: category (Justin.tv Categories), which would be the same as the name appearing in the URL of its corresponding directory page on justin.tv (http://www.justin.tv/directory/science_tech, http://www.justin.tv/directory/featured, etc.)

param.name: limit
param.description: limit, which will cap the number of results returned, speeding up the request, max is 100, default is 50

param.name: offset
param.description: offset, which will make the call return results starting at a particular offset, default is 0

param.name: language
param.description: language, which will select only channels in that language. Language is specified as the language code: nl, fr, zh-cn, etc.

method.description: Returns stream information for all live channels. The results are sorted by the current number of viewers, with the most popular channels first.

method.name: Summary

param.name: channel
param.description: channel, which will limit to those streams

param.name: category
param.description: category (Justin.tv Categories), which would be the same as the name appearing in the URL of its corresponding directory page on justin.tv (http://www.justin.tv/directory/science_tech, http://www.justin.tv/directory/featured, etc.)

param.name: language
param.description: language, which will select only channels in that language. Language is specified as the language code: nl, fr, zh-cn, etc.

method.description: Returns aggregate stream information for all live channels (possibly scoped by category).

method.name: Search

param.name: channel
param.description: channel, which will limit to those streams

param.name: title
param.description: title, which will limit to streams with the given title

param.name: category
param.description: category (Justin.tv Categories), which would be the same as the name appearing in the URL of its corresponding directory page on justin.tv (http://www.justin.tv/directory/science_tech, http://www.justin.tv/directory/featured, etc.)

param.name: limit
param.description: limit, which will cap the number of results returned, speeding up the request, max is 100, default is 50

param.name: offset
param.description: offset, which will make the call return results starting at a particular offset, default is 0

param.name: language
param.description: language, which will select only channels in that language. Language is specified as the language code: nl, fr, zh-cn, etc.

method.description: Returns stream information for the live channels that match a search query. The results are sorted by the current number of viewers, with the most popular channels first.

method.name: Show
method.description: Returns extended information for a user, specified by user id or login.

method.name: Favorites

param.name: limit
param.description: limit, which will cap the number of results returned, speeding up the request, max is 100, default is 50

param.name: offset
param.description: offset, which will make the call return results starting at a particular offset, default is 0

param.name: live
param.description: when set to true, will restrict results to live channels.

method.description: Get all channels who are favorites of a user.

endpoint.name: channel

method.name: Show
method.description: Returns extended information for a channel, specified by channel id or login. Requires OAuth authentication for private channels.

method.name: Fan

param.name: limit
param.description: limit, which will cap the number of results returned, speeding up the request, max is 100, default is 50

param.name: offset
param.description: offset, which will make the call return results starting at a particular offset, default is 0

method.description: Get users who are fans of a channel. Requires OAuth authentication for private channels.

method.name: Archives

param.name: limit
param.description: limit, which will cap the number of results returned, speeding up the request, max is 100, default is 50

param.name: offset
param.description: offset, which will make the call return results starting at a particular offset, default is 0

method.description: Get archives from a given channel. Requires OAuth authentication for private channels.

endpoint.description: Channel objects include embed code, status, title, etc.

method.name: Signin
method.description: Connects the user to the app

method.name: Signout
method.description: Disconnects the user

method.name: Get users
method.description: Gets all users from QLog

param.name: Cookie
param.description: The pastry.sid of the connected admin user

method.name: Signup
method.description: Creates a new QLog user

method.name: Me
method.description: Gets the information of the connected user

param.name: Cookie
param.description: The pastry.sid of the connected user

method.name: Get Apps
method.description: Gets all apps from an user

param.name: Cookie
param.description: The pastry.sid of the connected user

method.name: Get App
method.description: Gets an app from its _id

method.name: New App
method.description: Creates a new app

param.name: Cookie
param.description: The pastry.sid of the connected user

method.name: Update App
method.description: Updates an app

param.name: n
param.description: New application Name (empty for no changes)

param.name: cb
param.description: New callback Url (empty for no changes)

method.name: Renew secretkey
method.description: Renews the secretKey

method.name: Del App
method.description: Deletes an app

method.name: RabbitMQ URL
method.description: Returns the RabbitMQ URL and the exchange identifier of the app

param.name: appId
param.description: The clientId key of the app

method.name: Get Logs
method.description: Gets the logs from application

param.name: Cookie
param.description: The pastry.sid of the connected user

method.name: Add Log
method.description: Adds a log to an application

param.name: time
param.description: The date/time when the record was created

param.name: tags
param.description: A list of comma-separated tags associated with the application
